title: Newly Renovated, plank flooring, stainless appliances-Specials
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 868 Sq.
The Park in Bellevue earns its name with arboretum-style community surroundings while still connecting you to the convenience and excitement of downtown Bellevue and the greater Seattle metro.
With its stunning natural beauty and aesthetically pleasing renovated homes that complement the surrounding landscape, this pet-friendly community is a perfect place to call home.
At the end of each day, return home to a one or two bedroom apartment featuring a tiled, wood-burning fireplace and a private patio or balcony overlooking a wooded glen.
Reserved Carport, Cable Ready, Vaulted Ceilings*, Large Balcony or Patio, Extra Storage, Wood Burning Fireplace, Abundant Closet Space, Stainless Steel Appliances, Full Sized Washer & Dryer

Easy Access to Downtown Bellevue, Park-like Walking Trails, Online Rent Payments, Brand New Clubhouse!, Woodside Terrace with Fireplace, TV and BBQs, NEW Fitness Center, Lush Pacific Northwest Landscaping, Game Room, NEW Outdoor Swimming Pool
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
We require a $300 refundable pet deposit, $300 non-refundable pet fee and $35 per month pet rent (Per pet).
For more information, please call our leasing office.
